system.description: 1/Violence, when an ally falls to 0 HP, you may immediately heal them 2 HP, singing a song that returns them from the brink. Their next attack gains +2d. Additionally, when you Rally, you and all allies in burst 2 of you gains +1 Bravery, Faith, Speed, and Jump until the end of your next riff.
system.flavor: Sing full and true, Singer. Your song, your steps... It shall culminate in this moment. Your song shall be the song of a thousand weary ghosts, that sorrowsong: let them hear the cries of your heart, the blood of your soul.
